name: mongolian_beef
instructions: Thinly slice the flank steak against the grain.
In a bowl, combine soy sauce, water, brown sugar, and hoisin sauce.
Add the sliced steak and minced garlic and ginger to the bowl and let marinate for 30 minutes.
In a heated pan, cook the marinated steak until seared on both sides.
Pour in the remaining marinade and bring to a simmer.
Add the cornstarch slurry to thicken the sauce, stirring until it reaches desired consistency.
Garnish with chopped green onion and sesame seeds before serving.
notes: Serve with steamed rice or noodles.
